cause.description:
It is kinda like hands across America except with beer and mud holes and you dont have to hold anyones hand(fags)
1. To promote trail knowledge
2. The road is more of a guide line to follow
3. My Bronco will kick a cheveys ass off road any day
cause.mission: expose to the world the psychology of a true good ol' boy
cause.name: Four-wheeling to save America
